p: Influenza B seasons accounted for a significant burden in the <20 years. Little is known about the epidemiology of B viruses distinct lineages (Victoria and Yamagata) which diverged approximately 40 years ago and have since then co‐circulated on a global scale. Victoria lineage viruses are commonly identified in school aged children. 22 Our report showed that in 2015‐2016, the incidence in the <20 years was the highest reported over the five years study period.
